name: Kitty (Marganec)
description:
In this game you will have to take on the role of a sea cat named Kitty, who has been shipwrecked by mistake and fired from his job by Captain Fish.

Kitty's incredible luck has led him to South Alemore, an island of dreamers, scientists, inventors, writers, artists... However, the locals have plenty of problems for Kitty to solve. Of course, no one is forcing him to.

The protagonist quickly realizes that something has to be done, and it's up to the player! Most of your actions as the game progresses will affect further developments, and the ending.(plan to add non-linearity. May be cut)

Kitty becomes the one who makes the difference on the island called South Alemore, either for the worse or the better. Both for himself and the islanders.



P.S. The game is in development. Now available as a demo for June 30, 2022, but only in Russian. The game will be translated into English and Ukrainian after the release.
